definition: to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
Golden Week, two 7-day national holiday periods
Mt Huang/Yellow mountains/Huangshan prefecture-level city centered around Huangshan Mountains in south Anhui
Huang Guangyu (1969-), PRC entrepreneur and millionaire, founder of GOME Electrical 國美電器|国美电器[Guo2 mei3 Dian4 qi4]
ox/cattle/scalper of tickets etc/to fail to show up/to break a promise

Yellow Crane Tower in Wuhan City, built in 223, burnt down in 1884, rebuilt in 1985/favored place of poet sages, who in legend arrived riding golden cranes/Tang poem by Cui Hao 崔顥|崔颢[Cui1 Hao4], with theme 'the past will never return'/one of three famous pagodas in China along with Yueyang Tower 岳陽樓|岳阳楼[Yue4 yang2 Lou2] in Yueyang, north Hunan, and Tengwang Tower 滕王閣|滕王阁[Teng2 wang2 Ge2] in Nanchang, Jiangxi

sentences.english: All his life, Dr Huang served the people.
sentences.chinese: 黄医生为人民服务了一辈子。

sentences.english: Kevin Huang and David Lin are classmates.
sentences.chinese: 黄课文和林大卫是同班同学。

sentences.english: A naughty monkey is yellow, yellow teeth.
sentences.chinese: 小猴更调皮，叫小黄“黄牙小子”。

sentences.english: A massive sculpture of the seated Buddha rests in the yellowish sandstone cliffs at Single Pebble Village(Danzishizhen) just east of Chongqing.
sentences.chinese: 大佛坐落于重庆东部弹子石镇附近一处黄砂岩悬崖上。

sentences.english: I particularly love their Rice Noodle Soup, and the Panang Curry chicken over rice.
sentences.chinese: 我特别喜欢他们的牛肉汤河粉和黄咖哩鸡烩饭。

sentences.english: The colors in white light are red, orange, yellow, green, blue and violet .
sentences.chinese: 在白光中的颜色有红，橙，黄，绿，蓝和青。

sentences.english: Yellow bell peppers add color and flavor to any recipe.
sentences.chinese: 黄柿子椒添加颜色和味道的任何配方。

sentences.english: I and a yellow army of one guitar , sings well, the sound has been broken.
sentences.chinese: 我和黄大军一人一把吉他，唱得不好，一直破音。

sentences.english: If you like the yolk of salted eggs, you can insert one in the centre.
sentences.chinese: 如果你喜欢咸蛋黄，你可以在中间加入一个。

sentences.english: Washed by rain, the wheat field and grape trellises in front of the door beautifully shimmered with brilliant yellow and tender green.
sentences.chinese: 门前的麦垅和葡萄架子，都濯得新黄嫩绿的非常鲜丽。

sentences.english: Alice is trying on the yellow dress. It's a little longer.
sentences.chinese: 埃丽丝正在试穿那条黄裙子，裙子有点长。

sentences.english: Harry avoided his yellowish eyes as they scanned the Hall;
sentences.chinese: 他用那双黄眼睛扫视着礼堂，哈利避开了他的目光。

sentences.english: He had smoked for so many years that his teeth were permanently stained yellow.
sentences.chinese: 他吸了那么多年烟，牙齿都被永久地熏黄了。

sentences.english: Smoking makes your teeth yellow and ugly.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟让你的牙齿变得又黄又难看。

sentences.english: Dr. Huang is a professor of English literature at the Beijing University.
sentences.chinese: 黄博士是英国文学教授，执教于北京大学。

definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
(classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
